item.title: India Daily News – Jan 26
item.description: HEADLINES: - Exclusive: India to slash tariffs on cars to 40% in trade deal with EU, sources say - Sir Mark Tully, the BBC's voice of India, dies aged 90 - Shocked: Bangladesh protests Sheikh Hasina's Delhi address, calls her mass murderer | India News - Narsee Monjee College teacher murdered in Mumbai local; 1 arrested - The man killed by a US Border Patrol officer in Minneapolis was an ICU nurse, family says - Monster winter storm brings life to a standstill in US – scenes from New York and other cities - Gmail glitch floods primary inboxes with spam and misclassified emails - Union Budget 2026 to US Fed meet, Q3 results - India opt to bowl in third T20I against New Zealand, Bumrah back

item.title: India Daily News – Jan 25
item.description: HEADLINES: - Trump Threatens Canada With 100% Tariffs Over Trade Deal With China - Iran-US tensions LIVE: Iran military says 'Trump talks a lot'; Khamenei 'hiding' in Tehran bunker - Working with Board of Peace is going to be 'good thing' for U.N.: Trump - Republic Day: How does India choose its chief guest for 26 January parade - He Was A Nurse, Treated Sick Veterans: Family On Minneapolis Immigration Killing - Putin, Zelensky to meet soon? Will US-mediated trilateral talks end Russia-Ukraine war? What we know - Delhi founder says his confidence collapsed after quitting high-paying Google job: My ego didn't survive | Trending - No ink signature, no official seal: Why India's Law Ministry refused to deliver US SEC summons to Adani - T20 World Cup row: ICC gave Bangladesh warning
